text: The Montreal Maroons (officially the Montreal Professional Hockey Club) was a professional ice hockey team in the National Hockey League (NHL). They played in the NHL from 1924 to 1938, winning the Stanley Cup in 1926 and 1935. ==Other websites== *Results on hockeydb.com Category:Defunct National Hockey League teams Category:1924 establishments in North America Category:1920s establishments in Canada Category:1938 disestablishments Category:20th-century disestablishments in Canada
title: Montreal Maroons
